content.text: Like many people, I can't focus just on one single thing, but I need to remind myself of trying my best to stay focus and a soldier my way towards success.

Take programming as an example, I was all over the place, Javascript, Node, Typescript, React, Django, Python, C, Golang, etc. I only dabble here and there pretty much makes me a failure in all of them. Therefore I promise myself that I will focus on Javascript and React, when I am fluent in Javascript for sure I can learn more about Typescript and more, once I master the React framework with React Hooks API, I can conquer other frameworks. 

Focus is the key!
